messages.message:
Hey team, getting this error in search service, where `IB_OPT_IN` needs to be a parsable bool. When I search the repo for `IB_OPT_IN`, I find it set to the string `'IB_OPT_IN'` or something like `config_pb2.FeatureFlagStage.IB_OPT_IN`, neither of which are `true` or `false`. Any tips on how to resolve this error?

```2025/04/22 14:16:11 FATAL searchservice/main.go:374 -- Failed to read env configs: envconfig.Process: assigning ENABLE_PLUGGABLE_OAUTH to EnablePluggableOAuth: converting 'IB_OPT_IN' to type bool. details: strconv.ParseBool: parsing "IB_OPT_IN": invalid syntax```
@Kai is working on a fix for this!
oo thank you :slightly_smiling_face: is there an offending PR I can revert locally in the meanwhile?
the fix was just merged into master! could you do a rebase?
I no longer see the error, tyty
